data.title: Sofia Vergara Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Sofia Vergara on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Sofia Vergara including Despicable Me 4, The Emoji Movie, and more.
data.text:
Welcome to the Jungle

Season Four premiere. A behind-the-scenes documentary look at the filming of 'Medellin' on location in Bogota, Colombia. On set, Eric and Billy clash over keeping the film on schedule and Billy develops an infatuation with Vince's beautiful Colombian co-star that becomes increasingly disruptive to the production. Meanwhile, Drama tries to angle for a part in the film, and Ari provides color commentary from his L.A. office.

The Essence of Cleveland

When Cleveland is reunited with his former high school classmate, âFatty Patty,â who is now skinny, beautiful and still has a crush on Cleveland, Donna becomes extremely jealous and wary of Pattyâs motives for wanting to be friends with Cleveland. It turns out, Donna is right and Patty turns out to be a little crazy and tries to steal Clevelandâs âessenceâ causing Donna goes on the hunt to stop her. Sofia Vergara and Lizzy Caplan make special guest voice appearances.

Samba Story

Tired of the same dinner-and-a-movie routine, Jay convinces Michael to take dancing lessons to spice up their relationship. At first reluctant, Jay's argument that wins Michael over is that he better go to those lessons or else she'll shut down "pantyville". When they get there, only more problems waits for Michael. The samba instructor is all over Jay, which makes him so jealous he has the guy deported. The new instructor, however, is a very attractive woman who is all over Michael, making Jay jealous now. They decide to quit the samba lessons after all and spice up their marriage in their own way.

Party All the Time

Shelly's globetrotting college friend, April (SOFIA VERGARA - "Chasing Papi"), unexpectedly arrives in Miami. The duo's late-night partying antics cause Shelly to get into a huge fight at work with Rita and Janie after they are left outside a club with hip-hop star JADAKISS (himself) and his posse. Meanwhile, J.T. volunteers to bring his "D.J. Fine" persona out of retirement when Donovan needs a substitute for his regular D.J. at Z Lounge.
